title: Chanel Font
content:
Does anyone recognize this font used on the Chanel website?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204220434/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_3.jpg) | 40.71 KB |
author: Veseyjl

comments.content: What is the context? Probably a hand drawn logo.

The font is used for a name of a watch of theirs, so sadly it very well could be hand drawn.  
I found a font with some similar characteristics-peregroy  
but the e's are not nearly the same
